fields.name: Consult Witnesses:
fields.value: Learn the names of three players who do NOT visit your target tonight.

fields.name: Comb The Scene (charge 50%):
fields.value: Learn two random roles which visited your target the previous night.

fields.name: Interrogate Suspect (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Learn the identity and exact role of one player who visited your target the previous night.

fields.name: Keen Eye (passive):
fields.value: Learn how many Town and non-Town players visit you each night.

fields.name: Coffee (passive):
fields.value: You may use your abilities multiple times each night, depending on your score (0-33% = 1, 34-66% = 2, 67-100% = 3).
